bug.author: DariusKopka
bug.description: import open3d as o3d o3d.geometry.VoxelGrid.create_from_point_cloud(pcd, voxel_size=0.05) throw the folling error: AttributeError("type object 'open3d.open3d.geometry.VoxelGrid' has no attribute 'create_from_point_cloud'",)

comments.comment: Have installed open3d via pip/conda? Then this is related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-isl/Open3D/issues/1013>#1013</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yxlao>@yxlao</denchmark-link> Any progress on the online documentation?
